code: import{ADD_TO_CART,REMOVE_ITEM,ADD_QUANTITY,SUB_QUANTITY}from"../actions/action-types/cart-actions";export var addToCart=function addToCart(id){return{type:ADD_TO_CART,id:id};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(id){return{type:REMOVE_ITEM,id:id};};export var subtractQuantity=function subtractQuantity(id){return{type:SUB_QUANTITY,id:id};};export var addQuantity=function addQuantity(id){return{type:ADD_QUANTITY,id:id};};
